item.title: Discover the most environmentally friendly hotels worldwide with GreenHotelWorld
item.description:
Source: GreenHotelWorld website. GreenHotelWorld, in collaboration with TripAdvisor, now boasts the largest selection of verified eco-friendly hotels on a single platform. This was achieved by incorporating hotels from TripAdvisor’s GreenLeaders Program. With a global reach, GreenHotelWorld curates over 8,000 hotels recognized for their demonstrably sustainable practices. item.title: The eco-conscious GROHE smart water system is gaining traction in Asia
item.description:
Source: GROHE. The GROHE Blue system in action. GROHE Blue, a smart water system, has become increasingly popular in Asia since a May 2014 study revealed its smaller carbon footprint compared to bottled mineral water. The study estimated that the GROHE Blue system generates 17.96 g CO2-eq/liter, significantly less than the 70 to 600 g CO2-eq/liter produced by bottled mineral water.
